Text: Dear SaM, it has been 10 months since kandireega came out and a dvdrip still hasn't been released! please release asap! and SaM, where are the subtitles for this film?
you also started uploading mkv format..!!

Ye Chutiya quality to accchi deta hai par gadha pta nhi nhi kon se county me rehta hai or saari hindi filmo ke screenshots novalayer pe upload krta hai. are mere bhai novalayer india me ban hai.. or har kisi ko google se ip bypaass krte nhi ata hai so pls use imgur or dere tons of'em
